attributes.action: support Australia in its bid to permanently BAN whaling for ANY purpose and stop Japans annual cruel dolphin hunt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year Japan slaughters hundreds of whales and dolphins for the sake of "tradition". It can take up to an hour for a harpooned whale to die and it has been documented for dolphins to be still be alive while being slaughtered. We need to show our support to get this banned forever.

rejection.details: There are already similar petitions such as http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Dolphin-hunts
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
